General.Name: Triniti Dinamik PT Tbk
General.Description: PT Triniti Dinamik develops real estate properties in Indonesia. It develops residential and small office home office projects, as well as apartments. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Grogol Petamburan, Indonesia.
